TabulaRasa.UpdateDef.content:
1.3.8244 - Adjusted spawn rates to be higher so they spawn a lot more commonly among vanilla factions if that setting is enabled. - Added support for [NL] Facial Animation, thanks to Mafelusz2 for speeding that up. - Added racial hediffs to note the differences of each race from standard humans. - Disabled verbose logging. - Minor bug fixes and adjustments.
Note: [NL] Facial Animation was only tested alongside the Vanilla Textures Expanded retexture for it, as that is the only reason I was willing to add support at all.
Right click to dismiss update.
